product.title: Deadpool: Great Irresponsibility
product.description: Deadpool (Wade Winston Wilson) is a fictional antihero who appears in Marvel Comics' American comic novels. The character was first introduced in The New Mutants #98 by artist/writer Rob Liefeld and writer Fabian Nicieza (cover-dated February 1991). When Deadpool first appeared in The New Mutants and later in issues of X-Force, he was depicted as a supervillain, but he later evolved into his more known antiheroic figure..
